Title: SQLite Portable Library (Windows 8.1, Windows Phone 8.0, Windows Phone 8.1)
Description: This portable class library for SQLite available for Windows 8.1, Windows Phone Silverlight 8 and Windows Phone 8.1
HomeWiki:
SQLite provides a self-contained, server less, zero-configuration, transactional SQL database engine.

The SQLite product is a native extension and therefore the .NET developer has to wrap differently the code across different Windows platforms.

This portable class library for SQLite available as NuGet package (https://www.nuget.org/packages/SQLitePortable) simplifies the installation and development experience for .NET developers by providing a single interface across Windows Phone 8 (Silverlight based), Windows Phone 8.1 (Runtime based) and Windows Store (8.0 and 8.1).

Requirements for Windows Store Apps:

  1. Platform: x86, x64, ARM (Any CPU is not supported)
  2. Microsoft Visual C++ 2013 Runtime Package for Windows
  3. SQLite for Windows Runtime

Requirements for Windows Phone Store Apps:

  1. Platform: x86, ARM (Any CPU is not supported)
  2. Microsoft Visual C++ 2013 Runtime Package for Windows Phone
  3. SQLite for Windows Phone 8.1

Requirements for Windows Phone 8 Silverlight:

  1. Platform: x86, ARM (Any CPU is not supported)
  2. SQLite for Windows Phone
